{{ $json.emailVersion === 'INTRO-A' ? `Hi ${$json.Contact_Name.split(' ')[0]},

Hope it's been a good 2025 so far. Can't believe the summer is over already!

My name is Chloe and I handle business development for Terra Verde Cleaning. We are a commercial cleaning company that services Southern Florida.

I am looking to connect with people such as yourself within the industry to see if there are services you need and/or services we can have the opportunity to quote you on in the future. We focus heavily on creating a greener and cleaner space through all of our janitorial services and provide other services such as floor care, painting, window cleaning, and maintenance management consulting.

If there is a good time to connect this week or early next week, let me know.

Kind regards,
Chloe

Website: terraverdecleaning.com
Email: chloe@terraverdecleaning.com` : $json.emailVersion === 'INTRO-B' ? `Good Afternoon ${$json.Contact_Name.split(' ')[0]},

Thank you for allowing me the opportunity to introduce myself and Terra Verde Cleaning Services.

For over 30 years experience, we've proudly been servicing South Florida by providing professional janitorial services across multiple industries. This experience has given us a deep understanding of what facilities need to operate smoothly, safely, and cost-effectively. Our mission is simple yet powerful: "Leave each place better than we found it."

At Terra Verde, we don't offer cookie-cutter programsâ€”we create customized cleaning solutions designed to improve the environments where people live, work, and thrive. Our success comes from focusing on what matters most to our clients:

â€¢ Operational excellence: Clear, customer-focused service plans
â€¢ Technology â€“ We use technology to manage inspections, inventory, and labor timekeeping.
â€¢ Transparency: Open communication and cost-saving strategies
â€¢ Strong oversight: Effective management and supervision at every level
â€¢ Sustainability: Safe and healthy practices for your staff, visitors, and our team

We would love the chance to discuss how these solutions could benefit your facility. I've attached our brochure and included our website link below for your review:
www.terraverdecleaning.com

I'd be glad to set up a quick call to explore how we can add value to your organization. Please feel free to reach out at your convenienceâ€”I look forward to connecting.

Best regards,
Chloe Anderson
Terra Verde Cleaning Services

Website: terraverdecleaning.com
Email: chloe@terraverdecleaning.com` : $json.emailVersion === 'FOLLOWUP' ? `Good Afternoon ${$json.Contact_Name.split(' ')[0]},

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up on my earlier email to see if you had a chance to review the information I shared about Terra Verde Cleaning Services.

With over 30 years of experience, we've built our reputation on providing tailored cleaning programs that enhance safety, efficiency, and cost-effectiveness for facilities across South Florida. Many of our current clients first connected with us through a simple conversation about their unique challenges, which allowed us to design a program that truly fit their needs.

I'd welcome the opportunity to do the same for you. Would you be open to a brief call next week to discuss how Terra Verde can support your facility goals? Even a 15-minute conversation could help identify opportunities for improvement and potential cost savings.

Please let me know what time works best for you, and I'd be happy to accommodate your schedule.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Chloe Anderson
Terra Verde Cleaning Services

Website: terraverdecleaning.com
Email: chloe@terraverdecleaning.com` : `Good Afternoon ${$json.Contact_Name.split(' ')[0]},

I hope you're having a great week. This will be my final follow-up regarding Terra Verde Cleaning Services, as I don't want to overwhelm your inbox.

I understand that timing isn't always right for exploring new service partnerships, and I completely respect that. However, I wanted to leave you with a final thought: many of our most successful client relationships began when facility managers were simply exploring their options, even without an immediate need.

If your cleaning service needs change in the futureâ€”whether that's due to growth, budget considerations, or service quality concernsâ€”we'd be honored to earn the opportunity to discuss how Terra Verde's 30+ years of experience could benefit your facility.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I wish you and your organization continued success.

Best regards,
Chloe Anderson
Terra Verde Cleaning Services
